content:
Thunderbird is a pr0ogram running on your computer. Not a web site. So really I have no idea what you even mean by a blank page. You install it, set it up with your mail account details and when you open it , it reaches out to your mail provider and gets your mail.

What is this blank screen?
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I'm well aware of that - there's no need to sound so condescending. I was looking for a way to open without the "Choose what to set up" and "Import From another program" info - both of which are quite valid and useful, but not necessary to show every time the program is opened. If it's not possible, why not just say so, instead of just assuming that the user is an idiot?
creator: nmrn2012

content: Go to Help > Troubleshooting Information > Application Basics > Profiles > about:profiles. Launch the others one at a time and restart TB. If they all give the setup screen, try creating a new profile (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/profile-manager-create-and-remove-thunderbird-profiles).
creator: siffemoz

content: Thanks for your very helpful suggestion Ed. I have several profiles in the account and after the rude and unhelpful response from Matt I tried a couple of things and found one way to get TB to open how I want was simply to leave a profile message screen open when I closed the app. That way it reopens there and I can just switch to the one I want, which is pretty close to the way WLM works. That's probably the same, or at least similar, to your suggestion and I'll have a look at that later tonight - it's been a long day :-) Appreciate your help.
creator: nmrn2012

content: Perhaps if you walk us through what you are doing someone can guess as to what he issue is, but if it affects webmail as well as mail clients it is probably third party software like an antivirus, or it could be your images. I know Apple images do not go well in emails as they use an Apple proprietary file format by default that blurs image and movie into a single file. These tend to appear in emails as a blank placeholder, often in a frame.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Hai scritto Ho provato a fare tutte le manovre proposte Quindi esattamente cosa hai fatto?

Comunque è il tuo provider che ti sta bloccando l'invio. Magari come misura antispam o perché ha rilevato qualche altra anomalia. Può darsi che il blocco sia solo temporaneo, comunque è con il tuo fornitore che devi parlare.
